XXmmayuvru:0: Mahāmāyūrīvidyārājñī oṃ namo bhagavatyai āryamahāmāyūryai mṛtasaṃjīvanīṃ devīṃ duṣṭasatvanivāraṇīṃ vidyā rājñīṃ mahātmānīṃ māyūrīṃ praṇamāmy ahaṃ namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisatvebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo
XXmmayuvru:2: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya, namaḥ saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ, namo loke 'rhatāṃ, namo maitreyapramukhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ, namo 'nāgāmināṃ, namaḥ
XXmmayuvru:3: sakṛdāgāmināṃ, namaḥ śrotāpannānāṃ, namo loke samyaggatānāṃ, namaḥ
XXmmayuvru:4: samyakpratipannānāṃ. eṣāṃ namaskṛtvā imāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyārājñīṃ prayojayiṣyāmi. iyaṃ me vidyā samṛdhyatu, śṛṇvantu me bhūtagaṇāḥ. ye kecit pṛthivīcarāḥ khacarā jalacarā devā nāgā asurā marutā garuḍā gandharvāḥ
XXmmayuvru:5: kinnarā mahoragā yakṣā rākṣasāḥ pretāḥ piśācā bhūtāḥ kumbhāṇḍāḥ pūtanāḥ kaṭapūtanāḥ skandā unmādāś cchāyā apasmārā ostārakāḥ śṛṇvantu me ojāhārā bhūtagaṇā garbhāhārā rudhirāharā vasāhārā (Mmvr Taku 2) māṃsāhārā medāhārā majjāhārā jātāhārā jīvitāhārā balyāhārā mālyāhārā gandhāhārā dhūpāhārāḥ puṣpāhārāḥ phalāhārāḥ sasyāhārā āhutyāhārāḥ pūjāhārārā viṣṭyāhārā mūtrāhārāḥ kheṭāhārāḥ śleṣmāhārāḥ śiṃghāṇakāhārā ucchiṣṭāhārā vāntāhārā aśucyāhārāḥ syandanikāhārāḥ, pāpacittāḥ duṣṭacittā raudracittāḥ
XXmmayuvru:6: paraprāṇaharāḥ. imāṃ mahāmāyūrīvidyārājñīṃ pravakṣyāmi, gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ baliṃ ca dāsyāmi, apakrāmantu me pāpacittāḥ duṣṭacittā raudracittāḥ paraprāṇaharāḥ sarvagrahā ojohārāḥ śṛṇvantu me, saumyacittā maitracittāḥ kalyāṇacittāḥ śṛṇvantu me buddhadharmasaṃghābhiprasannāḥ.
XXmmayuvru:7: tadyathā kāli karāli kumbhāṇḍi śaṃkhini kamalākṣi harīti harikeśi śrīmati hari
XXmmayuvru:8: haripiṅgale, laṃbe pralaṃbe kālapāśe kālaśodari yamadūti yamarākṣasi
XXmmayuvru:9: bhūtagrasani, pratīcchatha māṃ, gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ ca dāsyāmi,
XXmmayuvru:10: rakṣatha mama sagaṇaparivārāṇāṃ sarvasatvānāṃś ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:11: jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ, sidhyantu me mantrapadāḥ svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:12: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavāṃ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma, jetavane
XXmmayuvru:14: sārdhaṃ, tena khalu punaḥ samayena śrāvastyāṃ jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍasyārāme
XXmmayuvru:15: svātir nāma bhikṣuḥ prativasati sma. navo dahrataruṇo 'cirapravrajito
XXmmayuvru:16: 'ciropasaṃpanno 'cirāgata imaṃ dharmavinayaṃ, saṃghasyārthe jentākadārūṇi pāṭayamānaḥ, anyatamasmāt pūtidāruśuṣirān niṣkramya mahatā kṛṣṇasarpeṇa dakṣiṇe pādāṃguṣṭho daṣṭaḥ sa klāntakāyo bhūmau nipatitaḥ, phenaṃ vāhayamāno 'kṣiṇī ca parivartayamānaḥ svapiti.
XXmmayuvru:18: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān ānandaḥ svātir nāma bhikṣum ābādhikaṃ duḥkhitaṃ gāḍhaglānaṃ bhūmau patitaṃ phenaṃ vāhayamānam akṣiṇī parivartayamānaṃ
XXmmayuvru:19: svapantaṃ, dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ yena bhagavāṃs
XXmmayuvru:20: tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt. ekāntasthitaś cāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat. iha bhagavan chrāvastyāṃ jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍasyārāme svātir nāma bhikṣuḥ
XXmmayuvru:23: pūtidārusuṣirān niṣkramya mahatā kṛṣṇasarpeṇa dakṣiṇe pādāṃguṣṭho daṣṭaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:24: sa klāntakāyo bhūmau patitaḥ phenaṃ vāhayamāno 'kṣiṇī ca parivartayamānaḥ svapiti, tasyāhaṃ bhagavaṃ kathaṃ pratipadyāmi.
XXmmayuvru:25: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat. gaccha tvam ānanda
XXmmayuvru:26: tathāgatasya vacanenānayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣo rakṣāṃ
XXmmayuvru:27: kuru, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ
XXmmayuvru:28: daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kuru. devagrahāto nāgagrahāto 'suragrahāto marutagrahāto garuḍagrahāto gandharvagrahātaḥ kinnaragrahāto mahoragagrahāto yakṣagrahāto rākṣasagrahātaḥ pretagrahātaḥ piśācagrahāto bhūtagrahātaḥ kumbhāṇḍagrahātaḥ pūtanagrahātaḥ kaṭapūtanagrahātaḥ skandagrahāto unmādagrahātaḥ chāyāgrahāto 'pasmāragrahāta ostārakagrahātaḥ
XXmmayuvru:30: (Mmvr Taku 4) jvarād ekāhikād dvaitīyakāt traitīyakāc cāturthakāt saptāhikād ardhamāsikān māsikād daivasikān mauhūrtikān nityajvarād
XXmmayuvru:31: viṣamajvarād bhūtajvarān mānuṣyajvarād amānuṣyajvarād vātikāt paittikāc chleṣmakāt sarvajvarāt, śirorttim apanaya ardhāvabhedakam arocakam akṣirogaṃ nāsārogaṃ mukharogaṃ kaṇṭharogaṃ hṛdrogaṃ galagrahaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ dantaśūlaṃ hṛdayaśūlaṃ pṛṣṭhaśūlaṃ pārśvaśūlaṃ udaraśūlaṃ maṇiśūlaṃ
XXmmayuvru:32: yoniśūlaṃ prajanaśūlaṃ gaṇḍaśūlaṃ vastiśūlaṃ ūruśūlaṃ jaṃghaśūlaṃ hastaśūlaṃ pādaśūlaṃ aṃgapratyaṃgaśūlaṃ
XXmmayuvru:33: rātrau svasti divā svasti svasti madhyaṃdine sthite,
XXmmayuvru:34: svasti sarvaṃ aho-rātraṃ sarvabuddhā diśantu me.
XXmmayuvru:35: tadyathā iḍi viḍi kiḍi hiḍi miḍi tiḍi āḍe ghāḍe durgāḍe hariṇi vaguḍi pāṃśu piśāci varṣaṇi ārohaṇi orohaṇi, ele mele tele tile, tili tile, mele mele, time
XXmmayuvru:36: time, dume dume, dudume dudume, iṭṭi miṭṭi viṣṭhande, capale vimale, hulu hulu hulu hulu, aśvamukhi, kāli kāli karāli mahākāli, prakīrṇakeśi, kulu
XXmmayuvru:37: kulu, vaphulu vaphulu kolu kolu hulu hulu, vahulu vahulu, kolu kolu, hulu
XXmmayuvru:38: hulu, vahulu vahulu, vosā dumbā dodumbā domadumbā, golāyā velāyā parivelāyā, piśu piśu, hili hili hili hili hili hili hili hili hili hili,
XXmmayuvru:39: oṃ mili mili mili mili mili mili mili mili mili mili. oṃ tili tili tili tili tili tili tili tili tili tili. oṃ culu culu culu culu culu culu culu culu culu culu. oṃ muhu (Mmvr Taku 5) muhu muhu muhu muhu muhu muhu muhu muhu muhu. oṃ mulu mulu mulu mulu mulu mulu mulu mulu mulu mulu. oṃ hu hu
XXmmayuvru:40: hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu. oṃ hulu hulu hulu hulu hulu hulu hulu hulu hulu
XXmmayuvru:41: hulu. oṃ vā vā vā vā vā vā vā vā vā vā. oṃ pā pā pā pā pā pā pā pā pā pā.
XXmmayuvru:42: oṃ jāla jāla jāla jāla jāla jāla jāla jāla jāla jāla. dama damani, tapa
XXmmayuvru:43: tapani, jvala jvalani, paca pacani, duṃdubhi garjani varṣaṇi sphoṭani,
XXmmayuvru:44: tapani tāpani, pacani pācani, hariṇi hāriṇi, kāliṇi kamali kaṃpani,
XXmmayuvru:45: mardani, maṇḍitike, kṣemaṃkari, makari śākari, śarkari karkari savari
XXmmayuvru:46: śaṃkari, jvalani jvalani, dumadumbani sukusume, golāyā velāyā parivelāyā
XXmmayuvru:48: maitrī me dhṛtarāṣṭreṣu maitrī airāvaṇeṣu ca,
XXmmayuvru:50: maṇinā nāgarājena maitrī vāsukinā ca me,
XXmmayuvru:56: aparājitena me maitrī maitrī cchitvāsutena ca,
XXmmayuvru:61: eteṣv api ca me maitrī nāgarājeṣu ca nityaśaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:63: sāketaś ca kumbhīraḥ sūcilomā tathaiva ca,
XXmmayuvru:64: uragādhipena kālena maitrī me ṛṣikena ca.
XXmmayuvru:69: mṛgilaś ca mahānāgo mucilindaś ca viśrutaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:70: pṛthivīcarāś ca ye nāgās tathaiva jalaniśritāḥ.
XXmmayuvru:71: antarīkṣacarā ye ca ye ca merusamāśritāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:73: apādakeṣu me maitrī maitrī me dvipadeṣu ca,
XXmmayuvru:74: catuṣpadeṣu me maitrī maitrī bahupadeṣu ca.
XXmmayuvru:75: mā me apādakā hiṃsyur mā me hiṃsyur dvipādakāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:76: mā me catuṣpadā hiṃsyur mā me hiṃsyur bahupādakāḥ.
XXmmayuvru:77: sarvanāgeṣu me maitrī ye nāgā jalaniśritāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:78: sarvabhūteṣu me maitrī ye kecit pṛthivīsthitāḥ.
XXmmayuvru:79: sarvasatveṣu me maitrī ye satvā atra sthāvarāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:80: sarve satvāḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve bhūtāś ca kevalāḥ.
XXmmayuvru:81: sarve vai sukhinaḥ santu sarve santu nirāmayāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:82: sarve bhadrāṇi paśyantu mā kaścit pāpam āgamatu.
XXmmayuvru:91: teṣāṃ namas te ca mama pālayaṃtu.
XXmmayuvru:92: sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ sarvopasargopāyāsebhyaḥ sarvajvarebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ sarvagrahebhyaḥ sarvaviṣebhyaḥ mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, jīvantu varṣaśataṃ paśyantu śaradāśataṃ.
XXmmayuvru:93: bhūtapūrvam ānanda himavataḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇe pārśve suvarṇāvabhāso nāmo mayūrarājā prativasati sma. so 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā
XXmmayuvru:94: kalyaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā divā svastinā viharati. sāyaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā
XXmmayuvru:96: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya namo bhagavatyai mahāmāyūryai
XXmmayuvru:97: vidyārājñyai. tadyathā hu hu hu hu hu hu, nāga le le le, dumba le le le, huya huya, vija vija,
XXmmayuvru:98: thusa thusa, guru guru, he cejini, agalu, elā melā, ili melā, tili melā,
XXmmayuvru:99: ili tili melā, ili mitte, tili mitte ili tili mitte, dumbe sudumbe, tosu
XXmmayuvru:100: tosu, golā velā capalā vimalā, iṭṭiri bhiṭṭiri riṭṭiri, namo buddhānāṃ cilikisi godohikānāṃ namo 'rhatāṃ hāla dāla varṣatu devaḥ samantena daśasu
XXmmayuvru:102: so 'pareṇa samayenānayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā rakṣāsvastyayanam akṛtvā saṃbahulābhir vanamayūrakanyābhiḥ sārdham ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānaṃ parvatapārśvena (Mmvr Taku 8) parvatapārśvaṃ kāmeṣu gṛdhra āsakto madamattaḥ pramūḍhaḥ pramūrcchitaḥ praluḍito 'nuvicaran pramādavaśād anyataraṃ parvatavivaram anupraviṣṭaḥ. sa tatra dīrgharātraṃ
XXmmayuvru:103: pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrair hiṃsakair avatāraprekṣibhir avatāragaveṣibhir mayūrapāśair baddhaḥ. so 'mitramadhyagataḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabdhaḥ, imām eva mahāmāyūrīvidyārājñīṃ manasyakārṣīt.
XXmmayuvru:104: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya namo bhagavatyai mahāmāyūryai
XXmmayuvru:105: vidyārājñyai. tadyathā hu hu hu hu hu hu, hulu hulu hulu, nāga le le le, dumba le le le, nāga le le le, huya huya, vija vija, thusu thusu, gulu gulu, hu cejini, agalu, elā
XXmmayuvru:106: melā, ili melā, tili melā, ili mitte tili mitte, ili tili mitte, dumbe
XXmmayuvru:107: sudumbe, tosu tosu, golā velā capalā vimalā, iṭṭiri bhiṭṭiri riṭṭiri, namo
XXmmayuvru:108: buddhānāṃ. cilikisi godohikānāṃ. namo 'rhatāṃ hāla dāla varṣatu devaḥ samantena daśasu diśāsu. namo buddhānāṃ svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:109: atha sa tasmād vyasanāt parimuktaḥ, svastinā kṣemeṇa svaviṣayam
XXmmayuvru:110: anuprāptaḥ. imāni ca mantrapadāny udāharati sma.
XXmmayuvru:111: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya namaḥ suvarṇāvabhāsasya mayūrarājñaḥ, namo mahāmāyūryai vidyārājñyai. tadyathā siddhe susuddhe, mocani mokṣani, mukte vimukte, amale vimale nirmale,
XXmmayuvru:112: aṇḍare paṇḍare, maṅgale maṅgalye, hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe, ratne
XXmmayuvru:115: sarvamaṅgalavādhani, manasi mānasi mahāmānasi, adbhute atyabhute, mukte mocani mokṣani, acyute, araje viraje, vimale, amṛte amare amaraṇi brahme
XXmmayuvru:116: brahmasvare, pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe, mṛtasaṃjīvani, śrībhadre candre candraprabhe, sūrye sūryakānte, vītabhaye, suvarṇe brahmaghoṣe brahmajeṣṭhe (Mmvr Taku 9) sarvatrāpratihate, rakṣa rakṣa māṃ
XXmmayuvru:117: sarvasatvānāṃś ca svāhā. namaḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ svastir bhavatu svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāñ ca. jīvantu varṣaśataṃ paśyantu śaradāśataṃ.
XXmmayuvru:120: syāt khalu punar ānanda anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājā babhūveti. na punar evaṃ draṣṭavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ. aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājā babhūva.
XXmmayuvru:121: asyāś cānanda mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā etarhi hṛdayam anuvyākhyāsyāmi.
XXmmayuvru:123: ili mitti, tili mitti, tili mili mitti, tili mile, mili tili mitti, cili mili mili, cili mili mili, tili mili, sutumbā tumbā, suvaca cilikisiya,
XXmmayuvru:124: bhinna meḍi. namo buddhānāṃ cilikisi prāptamūle, itihārā lohitamūle, tumbā sutumbā kuṭṭi kunaṭṭi, tila kuñja naṭṭi, aḍakavātyāyāṃ, varṣatu devo nava
XXmmayuvru:125: māsān daśa māsān iti. ili mili kili mili keli mili, ketumūle, dudumbe
XXmmayuvru:126: sudumbe, sudumoḍe, dalime santuvaṭṭe busavaṭṭe, vusara vusara,
XXmmayuvru:127: dhanavastrake, narkalā narkalime, khalime ghoṣe rakhile iti, sajjale,
XXmmayuvru:128: tumbe sutumbe, aṭṭe naṭṭe pranaṭṭe aṇanaṭṭe, anamāle, varṣatu devo navodakena sarvataḥ samantena nārāyaṇi pārāyaṇi haritāli kuntāli, ili
XXmmayuvru:129: misti, kili misti, ili kili misti, ili me sidhyantu, drāmiḍā mantrapadāḥ svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:130: idam ānanda mahāmāyūryā rājñyā hṛdayaṃ. iyaṃ cānanda mahāmāyūrī vidyārājñī grāmagatena manasikartavyā, araṇyagatena manasikartavyā, pathigatena
XXmmayuvru:136: vyādhiśateṣu, anyatarānyatareṇa vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ samānāpatsu vāsam utpannāsu manasikartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ. vadhyārho 'py ānanda daṇḍena mucyate daṇḍārhaḥ prahāreṇa, prahārārha ākrośena, ākrośārhaḥ, paribhāṣena,
XXmmayuvru:137: paribhāṣārho romaharṣaṇena, romaharṣaṇārha evam eva mucyate.
XXmmayuvru:138: sarvavyādhivinirvṛttiś cāsya bhaviṣyati. imāni cānanda vidyamantrapadāni
XXmmayuvru:140: cili mili kili mili ketumūle buddhavarṇe vusaraṇe vusaraṇe, vudāraṇi
XXmmayuvru:141: vudāraṇi, kevaṭṭe kevaṭṭakamūle, iti savale, tuṃbe tuṃbe, priyaṃ kare āvartta parivartta navodakena varṣatu devaḥ samantena. namo bhagavate iṭṭittāya indragomisikāya āśane pāśane pāpanikūle, kapilamitte ili mitte,
XXmmayuvru:142: namo bhagavate buddhāye, sidhyantu mantrapadāḥ mama sarvasatvānāñ ca svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:143: anayā cānanda mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā tathāgatabhāṣitayā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kuru, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ
XXmmayuvru:144: paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kuru. jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:145: śaradāśataṃ. nāham ānanda samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣyāsurāyāṃ yasyānayā mahāmāyūryā
XXmmayuvru:146: vidyārājñyā rakṣayā kṛtayā guptyā paritrāṇena parigraheṇa paripalānena śāntyā svastyayanena daṇḍaparihāreṇa śastraparihāreṇa viṣadūṣaṇena viṣanāśanena sīmābandhena dharaṇībandhena ca kṛtena, kaścid eva viheṭhāyopasaṃkrāmet. devo vā devā vā devaputro vā devaduhitā vā devamahallako vā devamahallikā vā devapārṣado (Mmvr Taku 11) vā devapārṣadī vā, nāgo vā nāgī vā nāgaputro vā nāgaduhitā vā nāgamahallako
XXmmayuvru:147: vā nāgamahallikā vā nāgapārṣado vā nāgapārṣadī vā, asuro vā asurī vā asuraputro vā asuraduhitā vā asuramahallako vā asuramahallikā vā
XXmmayuvru:148: asurapārṣado vā asurapārṣadī vā, maruto vā marutī vā marutaputro vā
XXmmayuvru:149: marutaduhitā vā marutamahallako vā marutamahallikā vā marutapārṣado vā marutapārṣadī vā, garuḍo vā garuḍī vā garuḍaputro vā garuḍaduhitā vā garuḍamahallako vā garuḍamahallikā vā garuḍapārṣado vā garuḍapārṣadī vā,
XXmmayuvru:150: gandharvo vā gandharvī vā gandharvaputro vā gandharvaduhitā vā gandharvamahallako vā gandharvamahallikā vā gandharvapārṣado vā gandharvapārṣadī vā, kinnaro vā kinnarī vā kinnaraputro vā kinnaraduhitā vā kinnaramahallako vā kinnaramahallikā vā kinnarapārṣado vā kinnarapārṣadī vā, mahorago vā mahoragī vā mahoragaputro vā mahoragaduhitā vā mahoragamahallako vā mahoragamahallikā vā mahoragapārṣado vā mahoragapārṣadī vā, yakṣo vā yakṣī vā yakṣaputro vā yakṣaduhitā vā yakṣamahallako vā yakṣamahallikā vā yakṣapārṣado vā yakṣapārṣadī vā,
XXmmayuvru:151: rākṣaso vā rākṣasī vā rākṣasaputro vā rākṣasaduhitā vā rākṣasamahallako vā rākṣasamahallikā vā rākṣasapārṣado vā rākṣasapārṣadī vā, preto vā pretī vā pretaputro vā pretaduhitā vā pretamahallako vā pretamahallikā vā
XXmmayuvru:152: pretapārṣado vā pretapārṣadī vā, piśāco vā piśācī vā piśācaputro vā
XXmmayuvru:153: piśācaduhitā vā piśācamahallako vā piśācamahallikā vā piśācapārṣado vā piśācapārṣadī vā, bhūto vā bhūtī vā bhūtaputro vā bhūtaduhitā vā bhūtamahallako vā bhūtamahallikā vā bhūtapārṣado vā bhūtapārṣadī vā,
XXmmayuvru:154: kumbhāṇḍo vā kumbhāṇḍī vā kumbhāṇḍaputro vā kumbhāṇḍaduhitā vā kumbhāṇḍamahallako vā kumbhāṇḍamahallikā vā kumbhāṇḍapārṣado vā kumbhāṇḍapārṣadī vā, pūtano vā pūtanī vā pūtanaputro vā pūtanaduhitā vā pūtanamahallako vā pūtanamahallikā vā pūtanapārṣado vā pūtanapārṣadī vā,
XXmmayuvru:155: kaṭapūtano vā kaṭapūtanī vā kaṭapūtanaputro vā kaṭapūtanaduhitā vā kaṭapūtanamahallako vā kaṭapūtanamahallikā vā kaṭapūtanapārṣado vā kaṭapūtanapārṣadī vā, skando vā skandī vā skandaputro vā skandaduhitā vā skandamahallako vā skandamahallikā vā skandapārṣado vā skandapārṣadī vā,
XXmmayuvru:156: unmādo vā unmadī vā unmādaputro vā unmādaduhitā vā unmādamahallako vā unmādamahallikā vā unmādapārṣado vā unmādapārṣadī vā, cchāyo vā cchāyī vā cchāyaputro vā cchāyaduhitā vā cchāyamahallako (Mmvr Taku 12) vā cchāyamahallikā vā cchāyapārṣado vā cchāyapārṣadī vā, apasmāro vā apasmārī
XXmmayuvru:157: vā apasmāraputro vā apasmāraduhitā vā apasmāramahallako vā apasmāramahallikā vā apasmārapārṣado vā apasmārapārṣadī vā, ostārako vā ostārakī vā ostārakaputro vā ostārakaduhitā vā ostārakamahallako vā ostārakamahallikā vā ostārakapārṣado vā ostārakapārṣadī vā,
XXmmayuvru:158: upasaṃkramiṣyaty upasthāsyaty avatārārthī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ na
XXmmayuvru:159: lapsyate. na devo devasamitīye sthānaṃ, na nāgo nāgasamitīye sthānaṃ,
XXmmayuvru:160: nāsuro 'surasamitīye sthānaṃ, na maruto marutasamitīye sthānaṃ, na garuḍo garuḍasamitīye sthānaṃ, na gandharvo gandharvasamitīye sthānaṃ, na kinnaraḥ kinnarasamitīye sthānaṃ, na mahorago mahoragasamitīye sthānaṃ, na yakṣo yakṣasamitīye sthānaṃ, na rākṣaso rākṣasasamitīye sthānaṃ, na pretaḥ pretasamitīye sthānaṃ, na piśācaḥ piśācasamitīye sthānaṃ, na bhūto bhūtasamitīye sthānaṃ, na kumbhāṇḍo kumbhāṇḍasamitīye sthānaṃ, na pūtanaḥ pūtanasamitīye sthānaṃ, na kaṭapūtanaḥ kaṭapūtanasamitīye sthānaṃ, na skandaḥ skandasamitīye sthānaṃ, na unmāda unmādasamitīye sthānaṃ,
XXmmayuvru:161: nāpasmāro 'pasmārasamitīye sthānaṃ, n'ostāraka ostārakasamitīye sthānaṃ lapsyate. yaś caimaṃ mahāvidyāṃ kaścid atikramiṣyati saptadhāsya sphuṭen mūrdhā arjukasyeva maṃjarī. imāni cātra mantrapadāni manasikartavyāni.
XXmmayuvru:162: tadyathā ili mili, kili mili, kili kiṃ dugdhe, mukte sumukte, ūḍa nāḍa sunāḍa,
XXmmayuvru:163: varṣatu devaḥ paramaḍakavatyāyāṃ, ārā pārā godohikā, ili mili bhijjilikā
XXmmayuvru:164: udukā ḍadukā karoḍukā ili mili tili mili, samantataḥ kṛtvā, hulu hulu hili
XXmmayuvru:165: hili, mili mili mili mili, pili pili pili pili, kili kili, śīrṣeṇa varṣaṃ,
XXmmayuvru:166: culu culu, cala cala, cili cili, ciḍi ciḍi ciḍi ciḍi, śikhi śikhi śikhi
XXmmayuvru:167: śikhi, juhu juhu juhu juhu juhu juhu juhu juhu juhu juhu, hara hara haraṇe, jaṃbhe prajaṃbhe, sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭānāṃ ca jaṃbhe prajaṃbhe,
XXmmayuvru:168: svāter (Mmvr Taku 13) bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ karomi, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca
XXmmayuvru:169: karomi. jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:170: citramūle citre citramāle, hale halamāle, phale phalamāle, hale hale, māle
XXmmayuvru:171: māle, khulu khulu vuru varuṇo, dhīre dharya, suru suru, hataṃ viṣaṃ,
XXmmayuvru:172: nihataṃ viṣaṃ, sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭānāṃ draṃṣṭrāviṣaṃ mūlaviṣaṃ annaviṣaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ tejasā, suru suru ke, cara cara ke, biri biri, hataṃ viṣaṃ,
XXmmayuvru:173: nāsti viṣaṃ, saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ, saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ tejasā, ela
XXmmayuvru:174: melā, ili melā, tili melā, tiha duha tilimā timā dumā, vimadhu sukumbhā sumbhā tumbā samatumbā, āḍe nāḍe, tila kuñjanāḍe, varṣatu devaḥ, tilikisi samantena navamāsāṃ, maitrī me sarvasatveṣu vuśaḍe śavariṇi vudāriṇi
XXmmayuvru:175: vudāriṇi, kevaṭṭe kevaṭṭakamūle itiśabare, tuṃbe tuṃbe priyaṃ kare, āvaṭṭa
XXmmayuvru:176: parivaṭṭa, navodakena varṣatu devaḥ samantena, namo bhagavate indragomisikāya iṭṭitāya godohikāya bhṛṅgārikāya, ale tale kuntale, aṭṭe naṭṭe kunaṭṭe āśane pāśane, pāpanikūle pratikūle, namo bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ. sidhyantu mantrapadāḥ svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:177: aśokam āśritya jino vipaśyī śikhī jinaḥ puṇḍarīkasya mūle,
XXmmayuvru:178: śālasya mūle upagamya viśvabhūt śirīṣamūle krakucchandabrāhmaṇaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:179: buddhaś ca kanakamuni uduṃbare nyagrodhamūle upagamya kāśyapaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:180: aśvatthamūle muni śākyapuṅgavaḥ upetya bodhiṃ samavāpya gotamaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:184: tā devatā muditamanā udagrāḥ kurvantu śāntiṃ ca śivaṃ ca nityaṃ.
XXmmayuvru:186: ili mili, kili mili, cili kili voli, udumbare, sudumoḍe, busara busara, hu
XXmmayuvru:187: hu, karañje karañjamūle, iti sanatā kuntari kuntāri, nārāyaṇi pārāyaṇi,
XXmmayuvru:188: paśyani paśya paśyani kapilavastuni, iḍivā iḍivā irivā sidhyantu, draviḍā mantrapadāḥ svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:189: imāḥ punar ānanda mahauṣadhayo brahmaṇā sahāpatinā bhāṣitāḥ, śakreṇa devānām indreṇa caturbhiś ca mahārājair aṣṭāviṃśatibhiś ca mahāyakṣasenāpatibhiś ca. yo hy ānanda āsāṃ mahauṣadhīnāṃ nāmasu
XXmmayuvru:190: gṛhyamāneṣu kaścit praduṣṭacitta upasaṃkrāmet, saptadhāsya sphuṭo mūrdhā
XXmmayuvru:192: kīrttimūle eramūle eraṇḍamūle samantamūle, aḍanāḍe kuśanāḍe, itte mitte,
XXmmayuvru:193: pāru aḍakā maraḍakā, ilikiśi godohikā, udvandhamābhi bhinne medā. namo
XXmmayuvru:195: svasti vo dvipade bhotu, svasti vo 'stu catuṣpade,
XXmmayuvru:196: svasti mārgavrajatāṃ ca svasti pratyāgateṣu ca.
XXmmayuvru:197: svasti rātrau svasti divā svasti madhyaṃdine sthite,
XXmmayuvru:198: sarvatra svasti vo bhotu mā caiṣā pāpam āgamet.
XXmmayuvru:199: sarve divasaḥ kalyāṇāḥ sarve nakṣatrā bhadrakāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:203: anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā tathāgatabhāṣitayā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kuru, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kuru. jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ.
XXmmayuvru:204: ye cānanda yakṣā mahāyakṣāḥ samudrakūle prativasanti. ye ca sumerau
XXmmayuvru:205: parvatarāje, ye cānyeṣu parvatarājeṣu, aṭavīṣu mahāṭavīṣu nadīṣu
XXmmayuvru:206: mahānadīṣu kuṃjeṣu mahākuṃjeṣu viṇeṣu taḍāgeṣu palvaleṣu giriguhāśmaśāneṣu catvareṣu mahācatvareṣu catuṣpatheṣu śṛṅgāṭakeṣu nagareṣu mahānagareṣu ghoṣeṣu grāmeṣu udyāneṣu vaneṣu kānaneṣu patheṣu utpatheṣu ca, ye cānanda yakṣā mahāyakṣā aḍakavatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ prativasanti, te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ
XXmmayuvru:207: kurvantu guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ.
XXmmayuvru:209: hari hāriṇi, cali cālini, tramaṇi trāmaṇi mohani staṃbhani jaṃbhani svayaṃbhuve svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:210: pūrvāyām ānanda diśāyāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro nāma gandharvamahārājā prativasati,
XXmmayuvru:211: gandharvādhipatir anekagandharvaśatasahasraparivāro gandharvāṇām ādhipatyaṃ kārayati. yaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rakṣati paripālayati, so 'pi
XXmmayuvru:212: saputraḥ sapautraḥ sabhrātā sāmātyaḥ sasenāpatiḥ sapreṣyaḥ sadūtaḥ sapravaraḥ sapārṣado 'nayā mahāmāyūryā (Mmvr Taku 16) vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ karotu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ
XXmmayuvru:213: paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca karotu. jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:214: suru suru suru suru suru suru suru suru suru suru me svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:215: dakṣiṇāyām ānanda diśāyāṃ virūḍhako nāma kumbhāṇḍamahārājā prativasati
XXmmayuvru:217: ādhipatyaṃ kārayati. yo dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ rakṣati paripālayati, so 'pi
XXmmayuvru:218: saputraḥ sapautraḥ sabhrātā sāmātyaḥ sasenāpatiḥ sapreṣyaḥ sadūtaḥ sapravaraḥ sapārṣado 'nayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ karotu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca karotu. jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:220: veluke veluke amitraghātanī varuṇavati somavati veṇumālini veluni putrike co cū ci cū svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:221: paścimāyām ānanda diśāyāṃ virūpākṣo nāma nāgamahārājā prativasati,
XXmmayuvru:222: nāgādhipatir anekanāgaśatasahasraparivāro nāgānām ādhipatyaṃ kārayati. yaḥ paścimāṃ diśaṃ rakṣati paripālayati, so 'pi saputraḥ sapautraḥ sabhrātā
XXmmayuvru:223: sāmātyaḥ sasenāpatiḥ sapreṣyaḥ sadūtaḥ sapravaraḥ sapārṣado 'nayā
XXmmayuvru:224: mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ karotu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ
XXmmayuvru:226: sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca karotu. jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:228: veduri veduri veduri veduri, maṭṭite maṭṭite, koṭi koṭi, vidyumati, hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu, cu cu cu cu cu cu cu cu, ru ru ru ru ru ru ru ru, ca ca ca ca ca ca ca ca, sa svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:229: uttarāyām ānanda diśāyāṃ vaiśramaṇo nāma yakṣamahārājā prativasati,
XXmmayuvru:231: ya uttarāṃ diśaṃ rakṣati paripālayati, so 'pi saputraḥ sapautraḥ sabhrātā
XXmmayuvru:232: sāmātyaḥ sasenāpatiḥ sapreṣyaḥ sadūtaḥ sapravaraḥ sapārṣado 'nayā
XXmmayuvru:233: mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ karotu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ
XXmmayuvru:234: daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca karotu. jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:235: sori sori, siri siri, mati mati, hiri hiri, mati pele mati pele, piṃgale curu curu, hataṃ viṣaṃ, bandhumati, nihataṃ viṣaṃ bandhumati svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:244: te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:246: ele mele, kile tile, mile śile, vāse, duṃbe duṃbe, varṣatu devaḥ samantena
XXmmayuvru:247: hili mili tuṃbe tuṃbe, aṭṭa vaṭṭa paradu vattā varṣatu devo guḍa guḍantu samantenāḍakovatyāṃ, aṇḍe maṇḍe tunde tutunde curke vukke, iriḍi miriḍi niriḍi ciriḍi, hili hili, hulu hulu, mili mili, tule tatale svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:248: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda mahāyakṣasenāpatīnāṃ nāmāni ye dharaṇyāṃ prativasanti.
XXmmayuvru:251: so 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ karotu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca karotu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:253: bale balkale, mātaṃgi caṇḍali puruṣa, nici nici nigauri gandhāre, caṇḍāli
XXmmayuvru:254: mātaṃgi, mālini hili hili, āgati gati, gauri gandhāri kauṣṭhikā vacari
XXmmayuvru:257: śailo bhadrapure yakṣa uttarāyāṃ ca mānavaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:265: yatra jāto muni buddhaḥ śākyaketur mahāmuniḥ.
XXmmayuvru:267: bṛhaspatiś ca śrāvastyāṃ sākete sāgaro vaset.
XXmmayuvru:281: mardane maṇḍapo yakṣo girikūṭaś ca mālave.
XXmmayuvru:282: bhadraś ca rohitāśveṣu sarvabhadraś ca sāgare,
XXmmayuvru:293: nandī ca vardhanaś caiva nagare nandivardhane,
XXmmayuvru:296: śūnye sūryaprabho yakṣo girimuṇḍaś ca kośale.
XXmmayuvru:298: malaye pūrṇako yakṣaḥ keraleṣu ca kinnaraḥ.
XXmmayuvru:302: nandike ca pitānandī vīraś ca karahāṭake.
XXmmayuvru:319: siddhapātras tathā śrughne sthalāyāṃ sthala eva ca.
XXmmayuvru:322: puṣpadantaś ca caṃpāyāṃ magadhaś ca giribraje,
XXmmayuvru:323: goyoge parvato yakṣaḥ susenaś caiva nāgare.
XXmmayuvru:324: vīrabāhuś ca sākete kākaṭyāṃ ca sukhāvahaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:325: kauśāmbyāṃ cāpy anāyaso bhadrikāyāṃ ca bhadrikaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:326: yakṣaḥ pāṭaliputre ca nāmnā bhūtamukhas tathā,
XXmmayuvru:330: vikaṭaṃkaṭāś ca ye yakṣā vasante kapilavastuni,
XXmmayuvru:335: yakṣo vṛndakaṭe khyātaḥ tathā vikaṭa ity api,
XXmmayuvru:337: prabhaṃkaraś ca kaśmīre campakas ca jaṭāpure,
XXmmayuvru:338: pāñcika iti nāmnā tu vasate siṃdhu siṃdhuṣu.
XXmmayuvru:341: skandhākṣa iti nāmena sa bhrātā kauśike vaset,
XXmmayuvru:344: dharmapālaś ca khāśeṣu bahlyāñ caiva mahābhujaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:357: vemacitraś ca bāhlīke ketakeṣu ca piṅgalaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:360: citrasenaś ca vokkāne ramatheṣu ca rāvaṇaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:365: nandī va nandinagare grāmaghoṣe baliḥ sthitaḥ.

XXmmayuvru:379: sarvasatvānāṃ ca, culu culu culu culu culu culu culu culu culu culu, hili hili hili hili hili hili hili hili hili hili, mili mili mili mili mili mili mili mili mili mili, phuru phuru phuru phuru phuru phuru phuru phuru phuru phuru, ciṭi ciṭi ciṭi ciṭi ciṭi ciṭi ciṭi ciṭi ciṭi ciṭi, nāśaya sarvaśatrūn mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca, hikke mikke cikke cukke śrībhadre maṅgale samantabhadre hiraṇyagarbhe, sarvārthasādhani, amale vimale,

XXmmayuvru:392: piṅgalaś ceti. te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama
XXmmayuvru:393: sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:395: uttarāyām ānanda diśāyāṃ catvāro mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ prativasanti, ye uttarāṃ diśaṃ rakṣanti paripālayanti. tadyathā. dharaṇo dharananda udyogapālo viṣṇuś ceti. te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ
XXmmayuvru:396: viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:397: catvāra ima ānanda mahāyakṣasenāpatayo ye vidiśāsu prativasanti, ye vidiśo rakṣanti paripālayanti. tadyathā. pañcikaḥ pañcālagaṇḍaḥ sātāgirir
XXmmayuvru:398: haimavataś ca. te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama
XXmmayuvru:399: sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ (Mmvr Taku 26) ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ.
XXmmayuvru:400: catvāra ima ānanda mahāyakṣasenāpatayo ye dharaṇyāṃ prativasanti, ye dharaṇīgatān satvān rakṣanti paripālayanti. tadyathā. bhūmaḥ subhūmaḥ kāla
XXmmayuvru:401: upakālaś ceti. te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama
XXmmayuvru:402: sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:404: catvāra ima ānanda mahāyakṣasenāpatayo ye 'ntarīkṣe prativasanti, ye
XXmmayuvru:405: 'ntarīkṣe gatān satvān rakṣanti paripālayanti. tadyathā sūryaḥ somo 'gnir
XXmmayuvru:406: vāyuś ceti. te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama
XXmmayuvru:407: sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:409: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya dharmabhrātṝṇāṃ nāmāni, ye satvān rakṣanti paripālayanti. ītīś copadravāṃś copasargāṃś ca sarvasatvānāṃ nāśayanti, lokānugrahārthaṃ lokam anuvicaranti. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:410: indraḥ somaḥ sūryo varuṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ bharadvājaḥ īśanaś candanaḥ kāmaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kunikaṇṭho nikaṇṭhako vaḍir maṇir māṇicaraḥ praṇāda upapañcakaḥ sātāgirir haimavataḥ (Mmvr Taku 27) pūrṇakaḥ khadiraḥ kovido gopālayakṣa āṭavako nararājo jinarṣabhaḥ pāñcālagaṇḍaḥ sumukho dīrghayakṣaḥ saparijanaś citrasenaś ca gandharvas triphālī ca trikhaṇṭhakaḥ dīrghaśaktiś ca mātaliḥ.
XXmmayuvru:411: ete yakṣāḥ mahāyakṣāḥ senāyāḥ parināyakā ṛddhimanto dyutimanto varṇavanto yaśasvinaḥ vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya dharmabhrātaraḥ, yeṣāṃ vaiśravaṇo mahārājā ārocayati, ayaṃ me yakṣo viheṭhayaty ayaṃ me na muñcati, ime vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya dharmabhrātaraḥ, te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca
XXmmayuvru:412: kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ. paritrāyantu
XXmmayuvru:413: kalikalahavigrahavivādebhyaḥ, paritrāyantu manuṣyagrahātaḥ amanuṣyagrahātaḥ, devagrahātaḥ, nāgagrahātaḥ, asuragrahātaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:418: apasmāragrahātaḥ, ostārakagrahātaḥ, nakṣatragrahātaḥ lepakagrahātaḥ, mama rakṣāṃ kurvantu.
XXmmayuvru:419: ojohāriṇīto rudhirāhāriṇīto vasāhāriṇīto māṃsāhāriṇīto medāhāriṇīto majjāhāriṇīto, (Mmvr Taku 28) jātāhāriṇīto jīvitāhāriṇīto balyāhāriṇīto
XXmmayuvru:420: mālyāhāriṇīto gandhāhāriṇītaḥ puṣpāhāriṇītaḥ phalāhāriṇītaḥ sasyāhāriṇīto āhutyāhāriṇītaḥ pūyāhāriṇīto rudhirāhāriṇīto viṣṭāhāriṇīto mūtrāhāriṇītaḥ kheṭāhāriṇītaḥ śleṣmāhāriṇītaḥ siṃhānakāhāriṇīto vāntāhāriṇīto viriṃktāhāriṇīto aśucyāhāriṇītaḥ syandikāhāriṇītaḥ svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ ca parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu,
XXmmayuvru:421: kṛtyākarmaṇaḥ kākhordakiraṇād havanāto huvanāta unmādāto bhūtāto vetāḍātaś ciccātaḥ preṣyakāto durbhuktāto duścharditāto duścchāyāto duṣprekṣito durlikhitāto durllaṃghitāto 'vardhūtāta uttrāsāta ostārakāto 'pasmārato
XXmmayuvru:422: vitrāsato rakṣantu māṃ sarvasatvānāṃ ca. rājabhayāc caurabhayād agnibhayād
XXmmayuvru:423: udakabhayāt paracakrabhayād durbhikṣabhayād aśanibhayād akālamṛtyubhayād dharaṇīkampabhayād dhanikabhayāc caṇḍamṛgabhayād amitrabhayād maraṇabhayāt sarvabhayād rakṣāṃ kurvantu svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca dadrūkaṇḍūkuṣṭhabhagandarārṣakiṭimapistakapāmāvaisarpalohaliṃgabhayāt.
XXmmayuvru:424: śirorttim apanayantu. ardhāvabhedakam arocakam akṣirogaṃ nāsārogaṃ mukharogaṃ kaṇṭharogaṃ hṛdrogaṃ galagrahaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ dantaśūlaṃ hṛdayaśūlaṃ pārśvaśūlaṃ pṛṣṭhaśūlaṃ udaraśūlaṃ gaṇḍaśūlaṃ vaṣṭiśūlaṃ guḍaśūlaṃ yoniśūlaṃ prajanaśūlaṃ ūruśūlaṃ jaṃghāśūlaṃ hastaśūlaṃ pādaśūlaṃ aṅgapratyaṅgaśūlaṃ jvaram apanayantu. ekāhikaṃ dvāhikaṃ traitīyakaṃ (Mmvr
XXmmayuvru:425: Taku 29) cāturthakaṃ saptāhikaṃ ardhamāsikaṃ māsikaṃ dvaimāsikaṃ mauhūrtikaṃ nityajvaraṃ viṣamajvaraṃ bhūtajvaraṃ pretajvaraṃ mānuṣajvaraṃ
XXmmayuvru:426: amānuṣajvaraṃ vātikaṃ paittikaṃ śleṣmikaṃ sānnipātikaṃ sarvajvaraṃ sarvavyādhiṃ sarvagrahaṃ sarvaviṣaṃ sarvapāpaṃ sarvabhayaṃ ca nāśayantu svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:427: dvādaśemā ānanda mahāpiśācyo yābhir bodhisatvo mātuḥ kukṣigato rakṣito jāyamāno rakṣito jāto 'pi rakṣitaḥ, tāḥ punaḥ katamā dvādaśa. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:428: lambā pralambā vilambā olambā hārītī harikeśī piṅgalā kālī karālī kambugrīvā kākī kalaśodarī ceti. etā dvādaśa mahāpiśācyaḥ ṛddhimatyo dyutimatyo varṇavatyo yaśasvinaḥ, devāsuram api saṃgrāmam anubhavanti
XXmmayuvru:429: maharddhikāḥ. tā 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama
XXmmayuvru:430: sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:431: śaradāśataṃ. imāni cātra mantrapadāni bhavanti. tadyathā.

XXmmayuvru:746: parvatarājā, candramālaḥ parvatarājā, vallūlagṛhaḥ parvatarājā, kākanādaḥ
XXmmayuvru:749: ity ete cānye cāsmin pṛthivīmaṇḍale parvatarājanas tatra ye devā nāgā asurā marutā garuḍā gandharvāḥ kinnarā mahoragā yakṣā rākṣasāḥ pretāḥ piśācā bhūtāḥ kumbhāṇḍāḥ pūtanāḥ kaṭapūtanāḥ skandā unmādāś chāyā apasmārā ostārakā siddhavidyādharāḥ rājānaś ca saparivārā naivāsikāḥ prativasanti.
XXmmayuvru:750: te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:755: rātrau svasti divā svasti svasti madhyaṃdine sthite,
XXmmayuvru:756: svasti sarvam ahorātraṃ sarvabuddhā diśantu vaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:757: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda nakṣatrāṇāṃ nāmāni ye gagane vicaranti avabhāsayanti.
XXmmayuvru:761: ity ete saptanakṣatrāḥ pūrvadvārikāsthitāḥ ye pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rakṣanti paripālayanti.
XXmmayuvru:762: te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ (Mmvr Taku 51) kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:764: maghā cāmitramarthanī phālguny ubhe tathaiva ca,
XXmmayuvru:765: hastā citrā ca svāstī ca viśākhā bhavati saptamī.
XXmmayuvru:766: ity ete saptanakṣatrā dakṣiṇadvārikāsthitāḥ, ye dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ rakṣanti
XXmmayuvru:767: paripālayanti. te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama
XXmmayuvru:768: sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:770: anurādhā mahātejā jeṣṭhā mūlā tathaiva ca,
XXmmayuvru:771: pūrvottare ca āṣāḍhe abhijic chravaṇas tathā.
XXmmayuvru:772: ity ete saptanakṣatrāḥ paścimadvārikāsthitāḥ, ye paścimāṃ diśaṃ rakṣanti
XXmmayuvru:774: te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:776: dhaṇiṣṭhā śatabhiṣā caiva ubhe bhādrapade tathā,
XXmmayuvru:777: revatī cāśvinī caiva bharaṇī bhavati saptamī.
XXmmayuvru:778: ity ete saptanakṣatrā uttaradvārikāsthitāḥ, ye uttarāṃ diśaṃ rakṣanti
XXmmayuvru:780: te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ (Mmvr Taku 52) daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ
XXmmayuvru:781: viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ.
XXmmayuvru:782: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda grahāṇāṃ nāmāni, ye grahā nakṣatreṣu caranto hrāsavṛddhiṃ sukhaduḥkhaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣadurbhikṣaṃ ca nivedayanti
XXmmayuvru:784: sūryo grahaḥ, candro grahaḥ, bṛhaspatiḥ grahaḥ, śukraḥ,
XXmmayuvru:785: grahaḥ, śaniścaro grahaḥ, aṅgāro grahaḥ, budho grahaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:788: tārāgrahās tathā pañca rāhuketuś ca saptamaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:794: te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:796: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda paurāṇāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ nāmāni. siddhānāṃ siddhavratānāṃ siddhavidyānāṃ dīptatapasāṃ nadīparvatavāsināṃ śāpāyudhānāṃ ugratejasāṃ (Mmvr Taku 53) ṛddhimatāṃ paṃcābhijñānāṃ vaihāyasagāmināṃ, teṣāṃ nāmāni kīrtayiṣyāmi. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:797: aṣṭamako nāma maharṣiḥ, vāmadevako nāma maharṣiḥ, vāmako nāma maharṣiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:798: mārīcī nāma maharṣiḥ, mārkaṇḍeyo nāma maharṣiḥ, viśvamitro nāma maharṣiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:799: vaśiṣṭho nāma maharṣiḥ, kāśyapo nāma maharṣiḥ, balamīko nāma maharṣiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:800: vṛddhakāśyapo nāma maharṣiḥ, bhṛgur nāma maharṣiḥ, bhṛṅgiraso nāma maharṣiḥ, aṃgiraso nāma maharṣiḥ, bhṛṅgī nāma maharṣiḥ, baṭṭo nāma maharṣiḥ, bhāgiratho nāma maharṣiḥ, aṃgīrajo nāma maharṣiḥ, ātreyo nāma maharṣiḥ, purastyo nāma maharṣiḥ, sthūlaśiro nāma maharṣiḥ, yama-d-agnir
XXmmayuvru:801: nāma maharṣiḥ, dvaisaṃpāyano nāma maharṣiḥ, kṛṣṇavaipāyano nāma maharṣiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:802: harīto nāma maharṣiḥ, haritāyano nāma maharṣiḥ, samaṅgiro nāma maharṣiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:803: udgato nāma maharṣiḥ, samudgato nāma maharṣiḥ, kṣāntivādī nāma maharṣiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:804: kīrtī nāma maharṣiḥ, sukīrtī nāma maharṣiḥ, gurur nāma maharṣiḥ, śarabho nāma maharṣiḥ, mardano nāma maharṣiḥ, potalako nāma maharṣiḥ, aśvalāyano nāma maharṣiḥ, himavān nāma maharṣiḥ, lohitākṣo nāma maharṣiḥ, durvāso nāma maharṣiḥ, vaiśaṃpāyano nāma maharṣiḥ, bālmīko nāma maharṣiḥ, surato nāma maharṣiḥ, madano nāma maharṣiḥ, manur nāma maharṣiḥ, prabho nāma maharṣiḥ, śukro nāma maharṣiḥ, bṛhaspatir nāma maharṣiḥ, aranemi nāma maharṣiḥ, śanaiścaro nāma maharṣiḥ, budho nāma maharṣiḥ, jāṃgulī nāma maharṣiḥ, gandhāro nāma maharṣiḥ, ekaśṛṅgo nāma maharṣiḥ, ṛṣiśṛṅgo nāma maharṣiḥ, gargo nāma maharṣiḥ, gārgyāyano (Mmvr Taku 54) nāma maharṣiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:805: bhāṇḍāyano nāma maharṣiḥ, kātyāyano nāma maharṣiḥ, kāṇḍyāyano nāma maharṣiḥ, bhīṣmo nāma maharṣiḥ, bhīṣmamātaṅgo nāma maharṣiḥ, kapilo nāma maharṣiḥ, gautamo nāma maharṣiḥ, mātaṅgo nāma maharṣiḥ, lohitāśvo nāma maharṣiḥ, sunetro nāma maharṣiḥ, suranemī nāma maharṣiḥ, asito nāma maharṣiḥ, bālikhilyo nāma maharṣiḥ, nārado nāma maharṣiḥ, parvato nāma maharṣiḥ, kṛmilo nāma maharṣiḥ.
XXmmayuvru:806: ity ete ānanda paurāṇā maharṣayo vedānāṃ kartāro mantrāṇāṃ pravartayitāraḥ, śāpānāṃ dātāraḥ, ugravrātānāṃ mahātejasaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:807: siddhaparākramāḥ. te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama
XXmmayuvru:808: sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu
XXmmayuvru:810: hiri hiri hiri, khiri khiri, miri miri, muri muri, hiri hiri, mili mili,
XXmmayuvru:811: ḍaphu ḍaphu ḍaphu, mathani, ghāṭani, pacani pācani, dahani dāhani, tapani
XXmmayuvru:812: tāpani, hanani, daha daha dahani, tālani pātani mojani sta stani jastani
XXmmayuvru:814: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda mahāprajāpatīnāṃ nāmāni, ye devā nāgā marutā asurā garuḍā kiṃnarā mahoragā yakṣā rākṣasā manuṣyā amanuṣyā
XXmmayuvru:816: brahmā prajāpatiḥ, atṛḥ prajāpatiḥ, ātreyaḥ prajāpatiḥ, agniḥ prajāpatiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:817: bhṛguḥ (Mmvr Taku 55) prajāpatiḥ, pulastyaḥ prajāpatiḥ, pulahaḥ
XXmmayuvru:818: prajāpatiḥ, manuḥ prajāpatiḥ, vaśiṣṭhaḥ prajāpatiḥ, duṣṭaḥ prajāpatiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:819: sutanuḥ prajāpatiḥ, sunandamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ, dakṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:821: ity ete ānanda mahātmānaḥ prajāpatayaḥ sthāvarajaṅgamasya bhūtagrāmasya rakṣārthe vyavasthitāḥ, te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ
XXmmayuvru:822: viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ. ebhiś ca mantrapadair apratihataiḥ rakṣāṃ kurvantu svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:823: hiri hiri, khiri khiri, mili mili, sili sili, hili hili, mili mili sili
XXmmayuvru:824: sili, ḍaphu ḍaphu ḍaḍaphu, grasani mathani dahani ghātani, pacani pācani,
XXmmayuvru:825: hanani dāhani, dala dala dālani pāṭani mohani sta stanī jambhanīye svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:826: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda mahāviṣāṇāṃ nāmāni. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:827: aṇḍarā, paṇḍarā, karaḍā, keyūrā, bhūtāṃgamā, bhūtapati, vindupati,
XXmmayuvru:828: śiripati, tejapati, tejograpati, yaśopati, araḍā, taraḍā, taradā,
XXmmayuvru:829: tarataraḍā, duttarā, dantājuhā, juhā, johā, jolā, melā, phurā, guhā,
XXmmayuvru:830: rucirā, danturā, ilikicikā, kirikirikā, kāmvā, śatanturā, vikuli, kirimi,
XXmmayuvru:831: taraṅgā, riṣṭā, āmravati, jambumati, manumati, kamale, vimale, kuṇḍale,
XXmmayuvru:832: ahituhi, duhi, vakve, vakvadūte, vatsamāte, mahāgāre, tulamve sulamve svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:833: ity ete ānanda mahāviṣās te 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor (Mmvr Taku 56) mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca
XXmmayuvru:835: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda mahāvṛkṣāṇāṃ nāmāni. tadyathā.
XXmmayuvru:836: kāñcano nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, pippalo nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, aśvatthāno nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, kapitthāno nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, udumbalo nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, kapītuko nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, śālo nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, karṇikāro nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, tiniśo nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, bilvo nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, cūto nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ, nicūto nāma mahāvṛkṣaḥ.
XXmmayuvru:837: ity ete cānye ca mahāvṛkṣāḥ teṣv api ca devatāḥ prativasanti. tā 'py anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā svāter bhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ
XXmmayuvru:838: kurvantu, guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ
XXmmayuvru:839: daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu, jīvatu varṣaśataṃ paśyatu śaradāśataṃ.
XXmmayuvru:840: iyaṃ cānanda mahāmāyūrī vidyārājñī saptabhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca. tadyathā. vipaśyinā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā
XXmmayuvru:841: cābhyanumoditā ca, śikhinā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca,
XXmmayuvru:842: viśvabhuvā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca, krakucchandena samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca, kanakamuninā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca, kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca, mayā caitarhi śākyamuninā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca. iyaṃ cānanda mahāmāyūrī vidyārājñī maitreyena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā (Mmvr Taku 57) ca.
XXmmayuvru:843: brahmaṇā sahāpatinā bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca. śakreṇa devānām indreṇa
XXmmayuvru:844: caturbhiś ca mahārājair dhṛtaraṣṭreṇa gandharvarājena virūḍhakena kumbhāṇḍarājena virūpākṣeṇa nāgarājena vaiśravaṇena yakṣarājena bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca. aṣṭāviṃśatibhiś ca gandharvasenāpatibhiḥ,
XXmmayuvru:845: aṣṭāviṃśatibhiś ca kumbhāṇḍasenāpatiḥ, aṣṭāviṃśatibhiś ca nāgasenāpatibhiḥ, aṣṭāviṃśatibhiś ca yakṣasenāpatibhiḥ, pāñcikena ca yakṣasenāpatinā, hārityā ca pañcaputraśataparivārayā bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca.
XXmmayuvru:846: iyaṃ cānanda mahāmāyūrī vidyārājñī anatikramaṇīyā devagraheṇa nāgagraheṇa asuragraheṇa marutagraheṇa garuḍagraheṇa gandharvagraheṇa kinnaragraheṇa mahoragagraheṇa yakṣagraheṇa rākṣasagraheṇa pretagraheṇa piśācagraheṇa bhūtagraheṇa kumbhāṇḍagraheṇa pūtanagraheṇa kaṭapūtanagraheṇa skandagraheṇa unmādagraheṇa chāyāgraheṇa apasmāragraheṇa ostārakagraheṇa.
XXmmayuvru:848: garbhāhāriṇyā vasāhāriṇyā māṃsāhāriṇyā medāhāriṇyā majjāhāriṇyā jīvitāhāriṇyā balyāhāriṇyā mālyāhāriṇyā rudhirāhāriṇyā jātāhāriṇyā gandhāhāriṇyā puṣpāhāriṇyā dhūpāhāriṇyā phalāhāriṇyā sasyāhāriṇyā āhutyāhāriṇyā pūyāhāriṇyā viṣṭāhāriṇyā mūtrāhāriṇyā kheṭāhāriṇyā śleṣmāhāriṇyā siṃhānakāhāriṇyā utsiṣṭāhāriṇyā vāntāhāriṇyā viriktāhāriṇyā aśucyāhāriṇyā syandikāhāriṇyā. anatikramaṇīyā
XXmmayuvru:850: anatikramaṇīyā (Mmvr Taku 58) jvareṇa ekāhikena dvaitīyakena traitīyakena cāturthakena saptāhikenārdhamāsikena māsikena dvaimāsikena mauhūrtikena
XXmmayuvru:851: nityajvareṇa viṣamajvareṇa bhūtajvareṇa mānuṣajvareṇa amānuṣajvareṇa vātikena paittikena śleṣmikena sānnipātikena. anatikramaṇīyā sarvajvaraiḥ.
XXmmayuvru:852: anatikramaṇīyā śirorttyā ardhāvabhedakenārocakenākṣirogena nāsārogena mukharogena kaṇṭharogena karṇarogena hṛdayarogena galagrahena karṇaśūlena dantaśūlena hṛdayaśūlena pārśvaśūlena pṛṣṭhaśūlena udaraśūlena gaṇḍaśūlena vastiśūlena yoniśūlena prajanaśūlena jaṃghāśūlena ūruśūlena hastaśūlena pādaśūlena aṅgapratyaṅgaśūlena. anatikramaṇīya
XXmmayuvru:856: yaś cemām ānanda mahāmāyūrīvidyārājñīm atikramet tasya vajrapāṇiḥ saptadhā mūrdhānam arjakasyeva mañjarīṃ sphoṭayiṣyati.
XXmmayuvru:857: sarvabuddhabodhisatvapratyekabuddhaśrāvakānāṃ tejasā naṣṭa āloko naṣṭaś cetasaḥ. āryapudgalās tena visaṃvāditā bhaveyuḥ. catvāraś cainaṃ mahārājānaḥ kṣuraparyantaiḥ śastrair mahāntaṃ vyasanam āpādayeyuḥ. śakraś cāsya devānām indras tridaśagaṇaparivṛto vajreṇa mūrdhānam abhibhindyāt.
XXmmayuvru:858: brahmatejasā cāsya vibhūtir bhasmaṃ gacchet. anayā cānanda mahāmāyūrīvidyārājñyā yasya rakṣā kriyate sūtraṃ pratisarā cābadhyate, sa bādhyarho hy ānanda daṇḍena mokṣate daṇḍārhaḥ, prahāraiḥ prahārārhaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:860: romaharṣaṇārhaḥ, evam eva mokṣate. na (Mmvr Taku 59) cāsya rājabhayaṃ bhaviṣyati, na caurabhayaṃ bhaviṣyati, nāgnibhayaṃ bhaviṣyati, nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati, na cāsya kāye viṣaṃ kramiṣyati, na śastraṃ kramiṣyati,
XXmmayuvru:861: sukhaṃ ciraṃ jīviṣyati, sthāpayitvā ānanda paurāṇāṃ svapnāṃ sukhaṃ ca
XXmmayuvru:862: prativibudhiṣyati, svastho nirupadravo niruttrāso nihatapratyarthiko nihatapratyamitro nirupahataḥ sarvaviṣabhayavinirmuktaḥ, sukhaṃ ciraṃ jīviṣyati, sthāpayitvā ānanda paurāṇaṃ karmavipākaṃ.
XXmmayuvru:863: iyaṃ cānanda mahāmāyūrī vidyārājñī ativarṣe anāvṛṣṭau coccārayitavyā.
XXmmayuvru:864: tataḥ sarve nāgā autsukyam āpadyante ativarṣaṃ grahīṣyati, anāvṛṣṭau ca dhārāpātaṃ kariṣyati, yāvat tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā abhiprāyo bhaviṣyati tāvad devo varṣiṣyati. asyāś cānanda mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyāḥ smaraṇād eva sarvabhayavairavāṇi praśamiṣyanti. kiṃ punar imāṃ
XXmmayuvru:865: sakalasamastām akhaṇḍaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati, svastyayanaṃ vā kuryāt.
XXmmayuvru:866: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda imāṃ mahāmāyūrīvidyārājñīṃ. paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya mahāmāyūrīvidyārājñīṃ sarvabhayavairapraśamanīṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye me bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīṇām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ ca.
XXmmayuvru:868: yāvati dhāvati balaki kuru tulu me svāhā. rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca svāhā.
XXmmayuvru:869: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:871: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:873: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ,
XXmmayuvru:876: yady alaṃ sarvabuddhānām arhatāṃ caiva yad yaśaḥ,
XXmmayuvru:878: svātibhikṣor mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca hataṃ viṣam,
XXmmayuvru:879: mahāmāyūrī vidyārājñī svāter bhikṣor mama bhavatu.
XXmmayuvru:880: sādhu bhagavann ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya yena svātir bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramya svāter bhikṣor anayā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā rakṣām akārṣīt. guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ
XXmmayuvru:881: viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ cākārṣīt, vyutthitaś cāyuṣmān svātir bhikṣus tasmād ābādhād āyuṣmatā ānandena rakṣāsvastyayane
XXmmayuvru:883: athāyuṣmān ānanda āyuṣmāṃś ca svātir bhikṣur yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ sarvaṃ yathā vṛttāntaṃ nivedya bhagavatānujñatau caikānte niṣaṇṇau.
XXmmayuvru:884: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam uvāca. dṛṣṭas te mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñāḥ prabhāva iti. tathā vāditaṃ bhagavantam ānandaḥ praṇamyovāca. kim idaṃ bhagavan na viditaṃ bhaviṣyati. bhagavān punar uvāca. apy evānanda catvāro
XXmmayuvru:885: mahāsamudrāḥ śoṣaṃ gaccheyuḥ, pṛthivī vā ākāśam utpadyet, candrādityau vā pṛthivyāṃ nipatetāṃ, nadyo vā pratiśroto gaccheyuḥ, na ca tathāgatasya
XXmmayuvru:886: vacanam anyathā bhaved iti. atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma. tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyārājñīṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīṇām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ
XXmmayuvru:887: cārocaya. sādhu bhagavann ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya imāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyārājñīṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayati bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīṇām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ ceti.
XXmmayuvru:889: idam avocad bhagavān, āttamanā āyuṣmān ānanda āyuṣmāṃś ca svātir bhikṣur,
XXmmayuvru:890: ye ca tasyāṃ parṣadi sannipatitāḥ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragayakṣārākṣasamanuṣyāmanuṣyās te ca sarve bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti.
XXmmayuvru:893: rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca svastiśreyo bhavatv iti.
XXmmayuvru:894: asyā mahāmāyūryā vidyārājñyā ayam upacāraḥ. apatitakapilagomayena śucau bhūmipradeśe gocarmamātraṃ sthaṇḍilam upalipya samutpannena kāryeṇa yena kenacid gomayena caturaśraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kartavyaṃ. tatra ca madhye
XXmmayuvru:895: buddhapratimā paścimābhimukhā sthāpayitavyā, tasyā vāmapārśve mahāmāyūrīpustakalikhitā citrakarmakṛtā vā sthāpayitavyā, atha vā trayo
XXmmayuvru:896: mayūracandrikāḥ kapilagomaye niṣadya sthāpayitavyāḥ, tataḥ śvetārkapuṣpāṇi śvetakaravīrabilbapatrāṇi śirīṣapatrāṇi ca datvā baliṃ tilakṛsaratilodakaṃ
XXmmayuvru:897: caiva pāyasaṃ guḍapūrṇakayāvakamadhupūrṇakabhaktāṃ yathā lābhena datvā prāṅmukhena gugguludhūpaṃ ca datvā tato dakṣiṇapaścimottaramukhena caturdiśaṃ pūrvoktānāṃ caturdiśānāṃ yakṣāṇām agrahāṃ kurvatā vaktavyaṃ,
XXmmayuvru:898: āgacchadhvaṃ, puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ gandhaṃ baliṃ dīpaṃ ca pratīcchadhvaṃ, rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvānāṃś ca. Oṃ varade hūṃ (Mmvr Taku 62) hariṇi sphuṭ kāriṇi
XXmmayuvru:900: tatra guḍapūrṇapāyasaṃ ca pūrvāyāṃ diśi sthāpayitavyaṃ, gandharvāṇāṃ sa baliḥ, tilakṛsarasurāpūrṇakaṃ ca dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi sthāpayitavyaṃ,
XXmmayuvru:901: kumbhāṇḍānāṃ sa baliḥ. kṣīrapūrṇakaṃ pāyasaṃ ca paścimāyāṃ diśi sthāpayitavyaṃ, nāgasuparṇīnāṃ sa baliḥ. siṃdhupūrṇakaṃ dadhibhaktam uttarasyāṃ diśi sthāpayitavyaṃ, yakṣāṇāṃ sa baliḥ.
XXmmayuvru:903: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat,
XXmmayuvru:904: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ.
